body_html:
Did you activate a conda environment before doing the install? Something like

conda create -yn pytorch
conda activate pytorch
USE_FFMPEG=1 USE_OPENCV=1 USE_LEVELDB=0 USE_LMDB=1 python setup.py install

The libcaffe2.so should install into site_packages/ directly next to the python code.
body_text:
Did you activate a conda environment before doing the install? Something like
conda create -yn pytorch
conda activate pytorch
USE_FFMPEG=1 USE_OPENCV=1 USE_LEVELDB=0 USE_LMDB=1 python setup.py install

The libcaffe2.so should install into site_packages/ directly next to the python code.
body:
Did you activate a conda environment before doing the install? Something like

```
conda create -yn pytorch
conda activate pytorch
USE_FFMPEG=1 USE_OPENCV=1 USE_LEVELDB=0 USE_LMDB=1 python setup.py install
```

The `libcaffe2.so` should install into site_packages/ directly next to the python code.
